mapper.select: SELECT m.MENU_NO, m.MENU_NAME, m.MENU_PRICE, m.MENU_IMG, m.MENU_STATUS, m.CATEGORY_NO, c.CATEGORY_NAME as categoryName, m.ENG_NAME FROM MENU m LEFT JOIN CATEGORY c ON m.CATEGORY_NO = c.CATEGORY_NO ORDER BY m.MENU_NO DESC
mapper.insert:

INSERT INTO MENU ( MENU_NO, MENU_NAME, MENU_PRICE, MENU_IMG, MENU_STATUS, CATEGORY_NO, ENG_NAME ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(MENU_NO), 0) + 1 FROM MENU), #{menuName}, #{menuPrice}, #{menuImg}, #{menuStatus}, #{categoryNo}, #{engName} )
mapper.update: UPDATE MENU SET MENU_NAME = #{menuName}, MENU_PRICE = #{menuPrice}, MENU_IMG = #{menuImg}, MENU_STATUS = #{menuStatus}, CATEGORY_NO = #{categoryNo}, ENG_NAME = #{engName} WHERE MENU_NO = #{menuNo}
